parameters.name: Ciphersuite
parameters.description: Custom cipher suite, indicating the specific encryption algorithm selected when CiphersuiteGroup is set to custom.

parameters.name: CiphersuiteGroup
parameters.description:
Cipher suite group. Default is all cipher suites. Value range:
- all: All cipher suites.
- strict: Strong cipher suites.
- custom: Custom cipher suites.

parameters.name: Http2
parameters.description:
Whether to enable HTTP2. Default is enabled. Value range:
- on: Enable.
- off: Disable.

parameters.name: Http3
parameters.description:
Whether to enable HTTP3. Default is enabled. Value range:
- on: Enable.
- off: Disable.

parameters.name: Https
parameters.description:
Whether to enable HTTPS. Default is enabled. Value range:
- on: Enable.
- off: Disable.

parameters.name: OcspStapling
parameters.description:
Whether to enable OCSP. Default is disabled. Value range:
- on: Enable.
- off: Disable.

parameters.name: Rule
parameters.description:
Rule content, using conditional expressions to match user requests. This parameter is not required when adding a global configuration. There are two usage scenarios:
- Match all incoming requests: Set the value to true
- Match specific requests: Set the value to a custom expression, for example: (http.host eq \"video.example.com\")

parameters.name: RuleEnable
parameters.description:
Rule switch. This parameter is not required when adding a global configuration. Value range:
- on: Enable.
- off: Disable.

parameters.name: RuleName
parameters.description: Rule name. This parameter is not required when adding a global configuration.

parameters.name: SiteId
parameters.description: Site ID, which can be obtained by calling the [ListSites](~~ListSites~~) interface.

parameters.name: Tls10
parameters.description:
Whether to enable TLS1.0. Default is disabled. Value range:
- on: Enable.
- off: Disable.

parameters.name: Tls11
parameters.description:
Whether to enable TLS1.1. Default is disabled. Value range:
- on: Enable.
- off: Disable.

parameters.name: Tls12
parameters.description:
Whether to enable TLS1.2. Default is disabled. Value range:
- on: Enable.
- off: Disable.

parameters.name: Tls13
parameters.description:
Whether to enable TLS1.3. Default is disabled. Value range:
- on: Enable.
- off: Disable.
